summary: CONSUMER STATED WHEN HE ATTEMPTED TO APPLY THE BRAKES, THE PEDAL WENT HALF WAY DOWN, IT WAS DISCOVERED THAT THERE WAS A FAULTY MAIN MODULE WHICH CONTROLLED THE BRAKE SYSTEM.  DEALER HAS BEEN NOTIFIED.  *JB  THE VEHICLE LOST IT'S BRAKING POWER ON A STEEP ICY HILL AND SLID WITH THE PEDAL FULLY DEPRESSED.  IMMEDIATELY AFTER THE VEHICLE WAS REPAIRED, THE BRAKE MODULAR HAD FAILED DURING A TEST DRIVE.  *SCC
